trigonometric: Zve kana zvine chekuita nemisimboti yetrigonometry
angle: Nzvimbo iri pakati pemitsara miviri kana ndege dzinopokana
radian: Chikamu chekona yeplane yakaenzana nekona iri pakati pedenderedzwa yakaderedzwa nearc yakaenzana nehurefu kune radius.
sine: Reshiyo yehurefu hwedivi rakatarisana nekona rakapihwa kune hurefu hwe hypotenuse yekona yekona yekurudyi
cosine: Reshiyo yedivi rakatarisana ne hypotenuse yekona yekona yekurudyi
tangent: Mutsetse unobata curve panzvimbo imwe chete
secant: Mutsara wakatwasuka unocheka curve pamapoinzi maviri kana kudarika
pythagorean theorem: Hukama hwakakosha muEuclidean geometry pakati pemativi matatu etatu rekurudyi
periodic basa: Chiitiko chinodzokorodza kukosha kwayo nguva nenguva kana nguva
amplitude: Kusuduruka kwakanyanya kana chinhambwe chinofambiswa nepoindi pamutumbi unodedera kana masaisai
chiyero chedhigirii: Chiyero chekona mumadhigirii, apo denderedzwa rakazara rakakamurwa kuita 360 degrees
